text: Chisimu Allah jwangantesya soni kupeleka chilandanyo cha njenjema kapena chakupunda pele. Sano awala wakulupilile niakumanyililaga kuti chilandanyochi chakuonaonape chakuumila kwa M’mbuje gwao, nambo awala wakanile niakasatiji: “Ana Allah akusaka chichi pa chilandanyo chalakwechi?” (Allah) akwalechelelaga wajinji kusokonechela nacho, nambo soni akwajongolaga nacho wajinji. Nambotu jwaangaalechelela kusokonechela nacho ikaweje wakunyosya
